AppKind Property

Requires: Base Development System

Class: Application Properties (ActiveX)

Indicates the LabVIEW instance the VI is running in, including invalid application types.

  1. Development System, including the Base Development System, Full Development System, or Professional Development System
  2. Run-Time System
  3. Student Edition
  4. Embedded LabVIEW, including LabVIEW Real-Time
  5. Evaluation
  6. Custom

Syntax

object.AppKind

Data Type

AppKindEnum
